message.raw:
Updated documentation and licensed the work

* Docstrings in autoscrub are now well formatted
* Provided some examples of using autoscrub autoprocess
* Added requirements file for installing autoscrub through pip/easy_install
* Added requirements file for readthedocs (distinct from the requirements for installing autoscrub)
* Added readme and contributing files for display through bitbucket
* Added contributor agreement PDFs
* Added licence header and COPYING file containing the full licence
* Added automatic version generation in module based on version in setup.py (the generated autoscrub/__version__.py file is now on the hg ignor elist as it will always be regenerated by setup.py and should not be manually edited)
* made a couple of minor changes to the autoscrub API (just cleaning up return data and arguments vs keyword arguments)
* Added ffmpeg/ffprobe check at runtime to command line tool.

  • Added licence header and COPYING file containing the full licence
  • Added automatic version generation in module based on version in setup.py (the generated autoscrub/version.py file is now on the hg ignor elist as it will always be regenerated by setup.py and should not be manually edited)
  • made a couple of minor changes to the autoscrub API (just cleaning up return data and arguments vs keyword arguments)
  • Added ffmpeg/ffprobe check at runtime to command line tool.

message:
Updated documentation and licensed the work

* Docstrings in autoscrub are now well formatted
* Provided some examples of using autoscrub autoprocess
* Added requirements file for installing autoscrub through pip/easy_install
* Added requirements file for readthedocs (distinct from the requirements for installing autoscrub)
* Added readme and contributing files for display through bitbucket
* Added contributor agreement PDFs
* Added licence header and COPYING file containing the full licence
* Added automatic version generation in module based on version in setup.py (the generated autoscrub/__version__.py file is now on the hg ignor elist as it will always be regenerated by setup.py and should not be manually edited)
* made a couple of minor changes to the autoscrub API (just cleaning up return data and arguments vs keyword arguments)
* Added ffmpeg/ffprobe check at runtime to command line tool.
